title: Visual Merchandiser Manager â€“ EU Joint Ventures
content:
Vision & Change: 
Demonstrate creative licence with Commercial application.
Apply effective and sustainable solutions to regional and local visual issues.
Able to recognise and reflect local trends and influences whilst maintaining cooperate identity.
Have strong understanding of JD Visual merchandising across apparel, footwear and accessories.
Work with brands to ensure JD is at the forefront of marketplace development. Work fluidly with cross functional departments to ensure new incentives , retail opportunities are captured and pre planned to create a precise execution and maximise sales.
Planning of new stores and imminent refits.
Team management development and forecasting. 
Manage as an inspirational leader with the ability to coach and mentor Visual specialists in order to improve individual and group competences.
Work closely with the Senior VM and Retail team to provide new training incentives, content and ideas on new ways to develop the VM team.
 Monitor, measure and report findings on training and developments.
Produce documents to support the Field VM team.
Communication & Culture: 
Having already gained extensive field knowledge you will be well positioned to embrace this challenging management role.
To succeed in this role you must have good Presentation skills with the ability to carry out and implement tasks.
This challenging and high-profile role demands a truly exceptional individual with excellent communication skills and have the ability to provide intelligent, articulate and concise feedback.
Proven experience of training and developing teams is essential.
 A commercial individual with a creative personality who can establish with effective visual solutions when required.
 
The Company:
The JD Group is a leading omnichannel retailer of Sports Fashion, Street & Premium Fashion, Outdoors and Gyms with over 60,000 colleagues over 3,400 stores across several retail fascia's in over 30 markets around the world.
We are an equal opportunities employer who embraces and values differences. We recognise the importance of an inclusive workplace culture in which everyone can thrive irrespective of their background or identity.
To be a part of this successful and continuously growing company, you will have the desire to ingrain our strategic goals of being a people first, a digital leader and customer focused organisation which provides operational excellence and is continuous with identifying new areas of growth into our day-to-day.
We know our employees work tirelessly to make JD Sports the success it is today and in turn, we offer them some amazing benefits:

Incremental Holiday Allowance
Staff Discount on qualifying purchases across Group retail stores and online
Exclusive Colleague Bike Discount scheme
Discounted Gym membership
Personal development opportunities to learn and develop at work
Access to Apprenticeships and accredited qualifications

Interested? 
If you are interested in this position, then press the Apply Now button.
Due to the high volumes of applications our opportunities attract, it takes time to review them all. If you don't hear back within two weeks of your application, please consider your application to have been unsuccessful on this occasion
Applications that meet the skills criteria will be contacted for a 1st stage meeting with the talent team. Shortlisted candidates will then be invited to interview with the hiring manager.
Thank you again for your time.
